titles.title: PAID AD Act
PAID AD Act
Preventing Adversaries Internationally from Disbursing Advertising Dollars Act

A bill to prevent foreign adversaries from influencing elections by prohibiting foreign nationals from purchasing at any time a broadcast, cable, or satellite communications that mentions a clearly identified candidate for Federal office, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary:
Preventing Adversaries Internationally from Disbursing Advertising Dollars Act or the PAID AD Act
This bill prohibits foreign nationals from making disbursements for political advertising.
